title: Mood Flix
description: An innovative platform offering personalized movie and book recommendations based on users' moods. Developed in collaboration with my colleagues, this project utilized a tech stack comprising HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Dayjs, jQuery, and WebAPI. By employing agile methodologies, we effectively navigated real-world development challenges, resulting in a polished and user-friendly product.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This project allows users to input important events and tasks in a daily planner, enabling efficient time management. It can serve as a to-do list for organizing activities during work hours, spanning from 9 AM to 5 PM.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This project delivers current and 5-day forecast weather details when users input a city name. It retains previous searches, allowing users to revisit results with a simple click.

title: Coding Quiz Challenge
description: This project is aimed to test your knowledge on basic JavaScript concepts through a short 1 minute quiz.

title: Professional README Generator
description: A command-line application that aims to generate professional README.md files based on user input using the Inquirer.js package to generate the prompts. It is built in Node.js and uses ES6 syntax.

title: Snake Game
description: This modernized version of the traditional snake game was created to practice the integration of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in building a simple interactive game.
